Lichtspielhaus (German. "Movie theater") Ã¢â‚¬â€ the second DVD of Rammstein group released on December 1, 2003 Motor Music label. DVD contains all videoclips of group which were available at the time of the edition of release. Also the release includes such section as Making Of in which it is possible to see processes of shootings of some videoclips (see below). The section of concert video contains shootings of concert performances from various concert venues, since 1996 and finishing 2001 (including there is video from last DVD release of Live aus Berlin group). In addition DVD has the section which contains commercials to three singles of group (Du hast, Links 2 3 4 and Mutter), and also different selection of the teleshootings concerning group.
